Journal.Title: Zhongguo Zhong yao za zhi = Zhongguo zhongyao zazhi = China journal of Chinese materia medica

Article.ArticleTitle: [Studies on initial infection sources and channels of black spot on Panax notoginseng (Burk.) F.H. Chen].

AbstractText: To probe into the occurring and developing regularities of black spot on Panax notoginseng for disease control.
After artificial inoculation, observation and analysis on the planting plots were conducted regularly.

The main infection sources include diseased seeds, seedlings, plants and soils. On the plot of new cropping, the initial infection sources are diseased seeds and seedlings while diseased plants and soils with pathogens are the main sources onplot of old cropping.
Wiping out the infection centre and sources are the major effective means for control of black spot on P. notoginseng.
